metadata.titel_preek: Moses and Monotheism: A Response to Dr. Freud

locutie.beschrijving: A dialogue between Freudian psychoanalysis and the burning bush narrative, focusing on God's self-existence vs. human projection.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: High academic quality; engages with the 'I AM' (YHWH) as being-in-action and historical deliverance.

illocutie.beschrijving: Primarily asserting the reality of God over against cultural atheism, with a late shift toward commissioning.
voorbeelden: I propose to call in the big guns.
The faith of Biblical Israel is not religion.
God is out there on the barricades.

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: Intellectual conviction of God's 'otherness' and a sense of being 'impressed' into service.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Implicit; the 'living Word' is mentioned at the end, but the Spirit's agency is not the focus.

voorbeelden: Freud believed religion is the last illusion.
The burning bush is an ineffable symbol.
This is not a philosophical statement.
I hope this makes you feel a shiver.
I identify myself with some words.
God... has come down to deliver them.
commissieven.kwaliteit: Weak; promises are mostly reported as past-tense historical facts rather than present-tense offers.

voorbeelden: I propose to call in the big guns.
declaratieven.autoriteit: The preacher speaks with academic authority but hesitates to use the 'I forgive/bless you' sacramental voice.

indicatoren: Extensive quoting of Freud and Woolf.
Talking about the 'intention' of biblical writers.
Explaining the 'proper interpretation' of the divine name.
constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer becomes an observer of a debate rather than a participant in an encounter.

missende_elementen: Present-tense promise to the specific congregation
Direct address of the 'You' as a subject of grace

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: Generic and historical rather than direct.

eerste_persoon.gebruik: Preacher's intellectual journey and identification with Paul.

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Rhetorical questions and a brief concluding address.
tweede_persoon.performatieve_context: Used mostly in the final paragraph.

derde_persoon.gebruik: Discussing Freud, Moses, God, and 'the high priests of culture'.

verleden_tijd.gebruik: Exegesis of Exodus and history of Freud's thought.

foutief_patroon.beschrijving: Assertive (Freud vs Moses) -> Assertive (Definition of God) -> Directive (Participate).
voorbeelden: God is being-in-action... it is an invitation to us... a summons to participate.
foutief_patroon.probleem: The 'summons' lacks a preceding performative 'Toezegging' (Promise) that empowers the hearer.

voorbeelden_slechte_verhouding: God is not a mystical entity... God is out there... Our God is marching on. [Therefore] participate.

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon functions as a brilliant apologetic lecture. It 'talks about' the performative nature of God's name without actually 'performing' the name for the hearer.

sterke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: I prefer the intellectual rigor of Freud to the feel-good religiosity.

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: The proper interpretation of the divine name... means one thing for sure.
zwakke_punten.probleem: Treats the burning bush as a data point for a lecture.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: It is an event of 'learning,' but not a sacramental event of 'encounter' until the very last sentences.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: The preacher remains a reporter of God's actions rather than a mandatory of God's present grace.

openbaringsleer.god_als_spreker: God is described as a speaker in the past, but the sermon doesn't facilitate God speaking now.
openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: The preacher identifies as 'impressed into service' but acts more as a witness than a herald.
tekstueel_bewijs: The subject of the story is not Moses... It is God.

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: No; the sermon is a 'response' to an intellectual challenge.
tekstueel_bewijs: The self-revelation of God... is not to convey information.

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: The theophany... testifies to a God who is not just being-in-itself.
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: Today, this same God steps out of the fire to claim you.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Moves from abstract testimony to direct address.

toezegging_versterking.probleem: Grace is discussed as a historical category (Christ died for the ungodly).
toezegging_versterking.suggestie: Apply the 'I AM' to the hearer's current bondage.
voorbeeldzinnen: Because He is I AM, He promises to be your deliverer from the 'Egypt' of your own illusions today.

adressering_verbetering.suggestie: Reduce the Freud quotes by 50% and increase 'You' address.
voorbeeldzinnen: You are not here by accident; you are here because the Fire has called your name.

indicatief_imperatief_herstel.probleem: The 'summons' feels like a new burden because it isn't preceded by a declarative gift.
indicatief_imperatief_herstel.suggestie: Declare the hearer free before asking them to march.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A brilliant academic piece that successfully unmasks 'religion,' but needs to transition from 'talking about the fire' to 'letting the fire burn the hearer'.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: SvT would focus on the preacher's 'self-revelation' as a believer; SAT reveals the preacher is failing to use the 'Declarative' key of her office.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: Rhetorically, this is excellent (antithesis, ethos); illocutionarily, it is 'stuck' in the assertive mode.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT reveals that despite the 'revolutionary' theme, the linguistic structure remains static and descriptive.

commissief: I have come down to deliver

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: The self-revelation of God in the burning bush is not to convey information.
kernzinnen_analyse.effectiviteit: Paradoxical; it conveys information about not conveying information.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: Who are you? You are one who has been drawn into Godâ€™s presence.
kernzinnen_analyse.effectiviteit: Strongest moment; creates the 'event' of identity.

appendices.notities: The sermon is a victim of its context (Harvard); it over-compensates with locutionary 'big guns' to earn the right to speak, leaving little room for the performative act.
